trans-unit.source: Add Authentication to Existing Azure Mobile Services App (iOS) | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Add Authentication to Existing Azure Mobile Services App (iOS) | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Learn how to use Mobile Services to authenticate users of your iOS app through a variety of identity providers, including Google, Facebook, Twitter, and Microsoft.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to use Mobile Services to authenticate users of your iOS app through a variety of identity providers, including Google, Facebook, Twitter, and Microsoft.

trans-unit.source: In this tutorial, you add authentication to the [Mobile Services Quick Start tutorial] using a supported identity provider.
trans-unit.target: In this tutorial, you add authentication to the [Mobile Services Quick Start tutorial] using a supported identity provider.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you complete the [Mobile Services Quick Start tutorial] first.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you complete the [Mobile Services Quick Start tutorial] first.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, just download the Quick Start iOS project: click Azure Portal > **Mobile Services** > your mobile service > the cloud sign on top left > **iOS** > **Create a New iOS App** > **Download and run your app** > **Objective-C** > **Download**.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, just download the Quick Start iOS project: click Azure Portal > **Mobile Services** > your mobile service > the cloud sign on top left > **iOS** > **Create a New iOS App** > **Download and run your app** > **Objective-C** > **Download**.

trans-unit.source: Remember to click **Create TodoItem Table** before you click **Download**, if you haven't already created the table.
trans-unit.target: Remember to click **Create TodoItem Table** before you click **Download**, if you haven't already created the table.

trans-unit.source: Restrict Data Permissions to Authenticated Users
trans-unit.target: Restrict Data Permissions to Authenticated Users

trans-unit.source: Next, learn [how to use the user ID value to filter returned data](mobile-services-javascript-backend-service-side-authorization.md).
trans-unit.target: Next, learn [how to use the user ID value to filter returned data](mobile-services-javascript-backend-service-side-authorization.md).
